alfredsnippet.snippet:
"Technically, Darwinism is not even a theory.  It is only a hypothesis which, to this day, remains totally devoid of experimental and descriptive verification.  Theories, sensu strictu, are hypotheses which, having been tested, have been found valid."

- John A. Davison
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Sensu Strictu
